title: Buy a Contract Send
description: Buy the Contract using an ID from a previous Price Proposal call

buy.description: The id received from a Price Proposal call

price.description: Maximum price at which to purchase the contract, or '0' for 'buy at market'

parameters.description: Optional field, used to pass the parameters for contract buy

currency.description: This can only be the account-holder's currency

date_start.description: For forward-starting contracts, epoch value of the starting time of the contract.

date_expiry.description: Epoch value of the expiry time of the contract. You must either specify date_expiry or duration.

duration_unit.description: Duration unit is s(seconds), m(minutes), h(hours), d(days), t(ticks)

barrier.description: Barrier for the contract (or last digit prediction for digit contracts).

barrier2.description: Low barrier for the contract (for contracts with two barriers)

amount_per_point.description: [For spread contracts only] Amount per point

stop_type.description: [For spread contracts only] Stop type (dollar or point)

stop_profit.description: [For spread contracts only] Stop profit amount

stop_loss.description: [For spread contracts only] Stop loss amount

passthrough.description: Optional field, used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the echo_req output field.

req_id.description: Optional field to map request to response
